name: Buckler Defense Tactics
description: Training to master defensive techniques using twin bucklers, including redirections, counterattacks, and shield-integrated movement.

workout_groups.name: Fundamentals of Buckler Defense
workout_groups.description: Developing core defensive skills using twin bucklers for blocking, deflecting, and tactical positioning.

workouts.name: Basic Buckler Guard Positions
workouts.description: Hold different buckler guard positions while maintaining balance and stance control.

workouts.name: Defensive Buckler Angling Drill
workouts.description: Practice adjusting the buckler angle to deflect incoming strikes effectively.

workouts.name: Basic Shield Bashing Mechanics
workouts.description: Use controlled forward movement to perform defensive shield bashes.

workouts.name: Buckler-to-Wrist Blade Transition
workouts.description: Deflect an attack with the buckler, then counter-strike using a wrist blade extension.

workout_groups.name: Defensive Redirection & Counter
workout_groups.description: Developing techniques for smoothly redirecting attacks and countering with precision.

workouts.name: Buckler Parry & Counter Cut
workouts.description: Parry an attack using the buckler and immediately follow with a counter-cut.

workouts.name: Defensive Roll & Buckler Guard Reset
workouts.description: Roll away from an attack and reposition into a solid defensive stance.

workouts.name: Multi-Angle Buckler Redirection Drill
workouts.description: Redirect attacks from different angles while maintaining control of the engagement.

workouts.name: Buckler Drop to Dual Blade Counterattack
workouts.description: Drop a buckler mid-fight to transition into a more aggressive dual-blade offense.

workout_groups.name: Elite Defensive Buckler Combat
workout_groups.description: Advanced drills to maximize defensive efficiency and integrate counterattacks at high speeds.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Buckler Deflection
workouts.description: Use both hands interchangeably to deflect attacks and maintain defensive readiness.

workouts.name: Buckler Feint to Off-Hand Strike
workouts.description: Fake a block with the buckler, then immediately strike from the off-hand position.

workouts.name: Combat Shield Bashing Sequences
workouts.description: Deliver controlled but forceful shield bashes to create openings for follow-up strikes.

workouts.name: Live Combat Buckler Defense Sparring
workouts.description: Engage in high-speed sparring while maintaining defensive positioning using twin bucklers.
